column4: hey, i'm having ridiculous problems w/ hibernate on critical battery power on karmic. first is that it hibernates even *after* i plug in the adapter, sometimes seemingly when it still has tons of power left (and always right after); second is that when it wakes up often it blackscreens and freezes until i press the power button and force shut down.
hibernate is a real PITA to get working
good to know -- probably shouldn't be enabled by default then. theadmin -- no, i didn't know that command existed, but i will try it next time; thank you
